# Kraidyl Spells
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new [[Kraidyl|kraidyl]] spells introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

- [[Aquatic Stealth]]

- [[Sate the Hunger]]
